Uses of Package
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread

Packages that use com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread
Package
Description
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread
 
com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread.latches
 
  • Classes in com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread used by com.telenav.kivakit.core.thread
    Class
    Description
    Batcher
    A Batcher has a queue of element batches which are processed by one or more worker threads.
    Batcher.Batch
    A batch of elements for processing
    Batcher.BatchAdder
    Adds elements to a batch and enqueues the batch when it is full before starting a new one.
    Batcher.State
    The execution state of this batcher
    KivaKitThread
    A thread with methods to start, pause, resume and stop (pause and resume are implemented only in RepeatingThread).
    KivaKitThread.State
    The execution states a thread can be in
    ReentrancyTracker.Reentrancy
     
    RepeatingThread
    A thread that repeatedly executes the KivaKitThread.onRun() method implementation at a given Frequency.
    StateMachine
    A simple state machine with a single state that can be transitioned from one state to another and which allows a caller to wait for the machine to transition to a particular state.
    WakeState
    The reason why a thread completed, either it was interrupted, it timed out or it succeeded.

    The reason why a thread completed, either it was interrupted, it timed out or it succeeded.
